title: AL Vijay, Amala Paul are officially separated : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
AL Vijay, Amala Paul are officially separated Kollywood couple Vijay and Amala Paul, who announced their divorce last year, are legally separated, say reports. IndiaToday.in | Written by Srivatsan A + A - Vijay and Amala Paul 
Director AL Vijay, who worked with Samantha in films like Deiva Thirumagal and Thalaiva, fell in love with the latter and the couple got hitched in June 2014. 
Last year, Vijay announced that he is separating from his wife Amala Paul and that the couple is planning for a divorce. According to reports, the couple has been granted a divorce by a family court in Chennai. 
While the reason for their separation remains unknown, reports suggested that Vijay's family wanted Amala Paul to stop acting in films. 
However, Vijay denied the news and quashed the rumours. He said, "When Amala wanted to continue her career in films, I supported her to the best of my ability. And she continued acting even after marriage. The new found accusation that I or my family was stopping her from work is completely untrue." 
On the work front, Amala Paul has been roped in to play one of the leads in filmmaker Vetri Maaran's gangster trilogy Vada Chennai. She will also be seen in Dhanush 's Velai Illa Pattathari 2. 
Vijay will be remaking the Tamil version of Malayalam hit Charlie, which will have Madhavan in the lead.
